abstract: The financial world has turned so volatile lately, and its story moves so fast, that bankers, money managers and analysts are latching onto a variety of market indicators in an effort to see what’s ahead. Janney Montgomery Scott uses something it calls Bessie.
snippet: The financial world has turned so volatile lately, and its story moves so fast, that bankers, money managers and analysts are latching onto a variety of market indicators in an effort to see what’s ahead. Janney Montgomery Scott uses something it ...
lead_paragraph: Everyone on Wall Street watches the Dow. Guy LeBas watches the Cow, Graham Bowley writes in The New York Times.

headline.main: Whither Wall Street? Pick Your Indicator
